about_the_game:
A mysterious gathering. An enigmatic god. A high-stakes game. Jeff Penny’s dramatic original soundtrack guides you on a dark, and twisted journey through a sadistic game of life and death.

Featuring over 30 minutes of music, specially arranged, mixed and mastered for the album, The Game of Fourtune Original Soundtrack is a gritty story told through driving synthesizers, roaring guitar, and soaring orchestral lines. Ranging from heart-pounding action tracks, to quiet, intimate melodies, this release draws inspiration from many visual novels and anime before it through the musical ideas that make them so memorable.
